document_data.name: ''The Escapades of Fundango Glovin''
document_data.History: A decrepit and decaying copy of ''The Escapades of Fundango Glovin'' could be found in the city of [[Baldur's Gate]], sold by [[Thomas C. Quirkilious]] of [[Chromatic Scales]], a music shop located in the [[Baldur's Gate/Lower City|Lower City]] of the Gate.
